Constructor Detail

GameSound

public GameSound(java.lang.String filename)
The constructor of a GameSound requires you to simply put in the address of the sound you wish to load. It will automatically detect the sound type and load the correct systems from there. Supported sound types include .wav and .mid NOTE: mp3 are not supported as of now!

Parameters:
filename - address of the sound you wish to load.
Method Detail

play

public final void play()
Start playing the audio clip

stop

public final void stop()
Stop playing the audio clip

reset

public final void reset()
Set the clip playback to the beginning.

isPlaying

public final boolean isPlaying()
See if the clip is still playing. If the clip has completed playing please consider either looping it or DELETEing it!

Returns:
true if the clip is playing. false if the clip is finished playing.

setVolume

public final void setVolume(int vol)

delete

public final void delete()
Free the resources dedicated to this sound (you must do this!!!)
